VASSAL.tools.version

Class SimpleVersionTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.tools.version.SimpleVersionTokenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VersionTokenizer

    public class SimpleVersionTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements VersionTokenizer
    A finite-state machine for converting version numbers into a series of integers. The integers thus returned from two different tokenizers may be compared to determine the temporal ordering of two versions. Valid version strings are matched by the following regular expression: \d+(.\d+)*. Invalid version numbers may be parsed up to the point where they become invalid. The final token in any completely parsed version is -1.
    Since:
    3.1.0
    See Also:
    Version, VersionFormatException
